name: Catacombs: The Asper Case
description:
Take part in a thrilling paranormal investigation with Catacombs: The Asper Case, a stationary VR narrative-driven immersive experience that transports you 20 feet underground to uncover the truth about Asper's demise.

Taking on the role of a paranormal investigator, you are charged with investigating strange, even menacing, phenomena taking place in the tunnels of the Catacombs of Paris. In 1804, Philibert Asper's body, a doorman from Val-de-Grâce, was found in the Catacombs. His death remains unsolved to this day. You will interact with a tape recorder to capture the voice of the spirit of the famous deceased, M. Asper.

Find out what lurks in the darkness, but make no mistake, spirits never come alone...
